actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the employee portion of Social Security taxes imposed on individuals who have been diagnosed as having cancer or a terminal disease.
short_title: Cancer and Terminal Illness Patient Health Care Act of 2000

summary.text: Cancer and Terminal Illness Patient Health Care Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to waive the employee portion of Social Security taxes on individuals diagnosed with a terminal disease or cancer (including cancer in remission).

titles.title: Cancer and Terminal Illness Patient Health Care Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the employee portion of Social Security taxes imposed on individuals who have been diagnosed as having cancer or a terminal disease.
